description: Izumi is one of Dhaka’s most popular Japanese restaurants, known for its fresh sushi, sashimi, and authentic Japanese flavors.
comments: Amazing sushi and very fresh ingredients!
A bit pricey but totally worth it.

description: The Canteen offers a cozy modern vibe and a diverse menu of international comfort foods — perfect for casual dining with friends.
comments: Amazing sushi and very fresh ingredients!
A bit pricey but totally worth it.

description: Sajna serves delicious Indian and Bangladeshi dishes with rich flavors — biryani and tandoori items are highlights.

description: Panshi is popular for its wood‑fired smoked barbecue, grilled dishes, and upscale casual dining experience.

description: The Atrium offers a refined dining experience with a wide menu including sandwiches, grilled mains, and European desserts.

description: Dhaba brings classic Indian street‑style flavors in a comfortable restaurant setting — rich curries and tandoori are favorites.
